Event.Maindescription:
Columbus Columbus விட்டாச்சு Leavuu ...
கொண்டாட கண்டு பிடிச்சு கொண்டா ஒரு தீவு ....
Leav’u Leav’u Leav’u .... வேண்டும் புதிய தீவு தீவு ...

SIS is happy to announce "Payanangal Mudivathillai – A Day Out to Isle of Wight" a Coach Holiday to the Island to enjoy a day of being together with friends and enjoy the short cruise, the sun, the sand and all the attractions and natural beauty that Isle of Wight has to offer including the world famous chairlifts taking you to see the needles rocks and coloured sands.

Date: Saturday, 13th September 2014
Pick Up Time: 7:00 AM
Pick Up Place: Hillingdon Station, Long Lane, Hillingdon, UB10 9NR
Car Parking: Available at the Station for £2.00 per day.
Drop Off Time: Around 8.30 PM at Hillingdon Station

Cost for coach and ferry travel
Members - £25 per person
Non Members - £30 per person
Children (less than 10 years) - £20 per person

Please note even an Infant needs to pay as everyone is counted as a person for the purposes of calculating the capacity for coach travel.

Bank Account Details
Bank Sort Code: 20-29-37
A/c Name: South Indian Society
A/c No. 50284645
Ref: Your Full Name

Due to the capacity restriction on the Coach we have to offer the seats on a "First Paid First Serve" basis so we request those who are interested to sign up and pay as soon as you can.

See you all at the day out on 13th September.

Due to operational and administrative difficulties we operate on a NO REFUND POLICY.
